mapper.delete:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
delete from jxdx_yyyj where lsh = #lsh# and khdxdh=#khdxdh#
mapper.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select yy.lsh,yy.khdxdh,yy.jgkhdxdh,yy.khlx,yy.khmc,yy.zjlb,yy.zjhm,yy.yjje,yy.blrq,yy.yyqsrq,yy.yyjsrq,yy.bz,yy.ppbz,jg.jgmc from jxdx_yyyj yy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = yy.jgkhdxdh where lsh = #lsh# and yy.khdxdh=#khdxdh#

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select yy.lsh,yy.khdxdh,yy.jgkhdxdh,yy.khlx,yy.khmc,yy.zjlb,yy.zjhm,yy.yjje,yy.blrq,yy.yyqsrq,yy.yyjsrq,yy.bz,yy.ppbz,jg.jgmc from jxdx_yyyj yy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = yy.jgkhdxdh where yy.khdxdh = #khdxdh# and yy.yylx='$yylx$'
mapper.insert:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
insert into jxdx_yyyj( lsh,yylx,khdxdh,jgkhdxdh,khlx,khmc,zjlb,zjhm,yjje,blrq,yyqsrq,yyjsrq,bz,ppbz) select coalesce(max(lsh)+1,1) lsh,'$yylx$' yylx ,$khdxdh$ khdxdh,$jgkhdxdh$ jgkhdxdh,'$khlx$' khlx,'$khmc$' khmc,'$zjlb$' zjlb,'$zjhm$' zjhm,$yjje$ yjje, $blrq$ blrq,$yyqsrq$ yyqsrq,$yyjsrq$ yyjsrq,'$bz$' bz,'$ppbz$' ppbz from jxdx_yyyj
mapper.update:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
update jxdx_yyyj set khlx = #khlx#, zjlb = #zjlb#, zjhm = #zjhm#, bz=#bz# where lsh = #lsh# and yylx = #yylx#
mapper.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where lower(dmmc) = 'khfxkhlx'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where lower(dmmc) = 'zjlx'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select (case when max(lsh)=0 or max(lsh) is null then 0 else max(lsh) end) +1 as LSH from MPAS_YYCK

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select cast(csz as integer) ts from xtb_xtcs where lower(csmc) = 'yysxts'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select F_GET_DQFP($blrq$,a.jxdxdh,a.gxhslx,a.khdxdh,'CK') as fpms from JXDX_CKZH a inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh=a.jgdh inner join khdx_kh kh on a.khh=kh.khh where jg.khdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and kh.zjhm='$zjhm$' order by A.khrq desc fetch first 1 rows only

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/
select count(1) cnt from JXDX_YYYJ where jgkhdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and zjhm = '$zjhm$' and ($qsrq$ between yyqsrq and yyjsrq or $jsrq$ between yyqsrq and yyjsrq) and yylx =$yylx$
